page.title: 18Recreation Swimming - School
page.content: Three mornings every week I get up at 07.00 for morning training sessions at the pool. I normally swim about 80 lengths (2,700 metres) during this session. I come home from the pool at 08.40 and get to school by 09.15. When the bell rings we go to assembly. Then we have morning lessons of English, Maths, and Welsh. In the afternoon we have Art, Needlework, Geography,Religious Education, Project Work and Games. My evening training session starts at 17.30. We do a variety of things such as leg kick,arm pull,full stroke and Individual Medley, and one length sprints,breathing once every length.I also swim about 80 lengths in the evening. I get home at about 19.00, worn out, but happy.
